sentences.sContent: ...one of the most perspicacious and perceptive historians of that period.
sentences.sCn: ...那个时期最敏锐、最有洞察力的历史学家之一。

synos.tran: 有洞察力的；聪颖的；敏锐的

remMethod.val: per + spic (看作spect， 看) + ac + ious (…的) → 看清的 → 有洞察力的

trans.tranCn: 有洞察力的；聪颖的；敏锐的
trans.tranOther: good at judging and understanding people and situations
